name: check-db-timezone
description: PostgreSQL 时间治理系统验证工程

scripts.prisma:generate: DATABASE_URL=${DATABASE_URL:-postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:55432/check_db_timezone} prisma generate --schema prisma/schema.prisma && DATABASE_URL=${DATABASE_URL:-postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:55432/check_db_timezone} prisma generate --schema prisma/probes/schema.prisma
scripts.test: npm run prisma:generate && npm run db:push && npm run test:once
scripts.test:tz-matrix: cross-env TZ=UTC npm run test && cross-env TZ=Asia/Shanghai npm run test
scripts.ci: npm run check:time-policy && npm run lint && npm run runtime-check && npm run test
